name: Quests
description: Quests is an online 2-4 player card game based on the Quests of the Round Table. The app server is built with Java, Spring Boot and Stompjs web sockets with a React client and hosted on heroku.

name: DQN Space Invaders AI
description: A deep q-learning agent to train a convonlutional neural network to play Atari 2600 Space Invaders with reinforcement learning.

name: LaneNet - Lane Detection
description: An end-to-end implementation of CNN based lane detection with instance segementation. Training an autoencoder mutli-branch network on the TuSimple dataset.

name: RTOS Scheduling
description: A simulation of preemptive scheduling of tasks in an RTOS. Implements priority, round robin, modified round robin, modulo based round robin and priority based round robin scheduling algorithms.

name: tlsr.io
description: tslr.io is a news board app that features NLP text summarization, analysis, and classification pipelines built using TensorFlow and Transformers with a Flask api

name: Chamber Crawler 3000
description:
CC3k is a simple, text-based rogue-like RPG for Linux and OS X developed in C++. The game is generated from a random number engine and is implemented with design patterns including MVC and decorator pattern. 

 Try it out: https://repl.it/@zayaanmoez/CC3K#README.md

name: Stoxs
description: A Web Scrapping tool with a Python API to export closing table data into csv and panda data frames from WSJ. Populates local databases with regular scrapping from WSJ for over 4000 companies across four markets. Text-based user interface for quering data from the databases to export as csv files or generate linear regressions, tables and candlestick graphs using Matplotlib for visualizing and analyzing stock data

name: DELIVR
description: Food ordering and delivery platform with dynamic content, authentication services, order tracking and account management. Developed with Javascript, Node, Express, Pug templating engine and MongoDB.

name: Portfolio
description: Personal site. Developed with React, Gatsby, GraphQL and Sass.

name: EDA - Weather AUS
description: A data analysis project in Jupyter. Preprocessed and cleaned weather dataset from Kaggle in Python and Jupyter to create a training dataset for training binary classification models. Used 6 different machine learning models to predict rain for the next day with an accuracy of 84% using gradient boosting trees.
